Scope of Duty and Responsibility of the Board of Directors To enable the Board of Directors to perform its duties efficiently a guideline on its duties was defined as follows

Manage and conduct the Companys business to be in line with the Companys objectives and regulations as well as the resolutions of shareholders meeting which is conform with the laws on integrity and carefulness for the utmost benefits of the Company
Consider and approve the Companys key policies goals guidelines and business plan including monitoring and follow up the implementation according to the plans
Monitor and supervise the performance and management of the Executive Board to ensure the implement in accordance with the assigned Companys policies
The Boards meeting shall be convened at least once every quarter
The main meeting agenda shall be clearly set in advance throughout the year
The details of meeting agenda shall be submitted to each director at least days prior to the meeting date so that the directors have sufficient time to study and consider them
In the consideration of each meeting agenda the interests and benefits of all shareholders and stakeholders must be fairly taken into account
The Company has set the policy regarding the minimum quorum at the time when the directors shall vote in the meeting that at least twothird of the total directors attending the meeting
Allow free expression of opinions at meetings
Allocate adequate time for each agenda to allow for debate and careful expression of opinions
Supervise to ensure that the management is in line with good governance policy and to prevent from any conflicts of interest
Roles and Duties of the Chairman of the Board of Directors

Take responsibility as the leader of the Board of Directors to oversee monitor and supervise the performance of the Board of Directors and other subcommittees to achieve the objectives as defined in business plans and conform with the good governance
Supervise to ensure that all directors have participated and encourage to create the good corporate ethics and good corporate governance

Represent as Chairman of the Board at the Boards meetings and Shareholders meetings by handle and manage the meetings to be in line with the Articles of Association its agenda and allocate proper time for the meetings
Promote the independent and transparent expression of opinions in the meetings
Supervise to ensure efficient communication between the directors and shareholders
Give the casting vote in the event the votes are tied at Board of Directors meetings
